crypto.name: ECC Fantasy
crypto.desc:
sahuang

So many mysterious curves. You can steal them all, and I don't really care because flag isn't among them.

crypto.name: FlagHash
crypto.desc:
Neobeo

I wrote a hash function in under ten lines! It uses finite fields to prevent any leakage of the flag.

crypto.name: Inexpensive
crypto.desc:
Quasar

Ok but really who has the time to generate nonces every time I want to sign something? I literally only need 1 signature...

crypto.name: Redundancy
crypto.desc:
Quasar

Alright what if like a seagull flies into like a powerline or something and messes with the transmission of my super secret very valuable flag. Clearly I must make a redundancy.

crypto.name: Share++
crypto.desc:
Neobeo

Last fortnight, maple3142 wrote a faulty implementation of Shamir Secret Sharing. I have flipped the sign and it should be correct now.

misc.name: Babyfunge
misc.desc:
Sheep

Since it's a "baby" challenge, I removed all the stuff you don't need. Less to worry about!

misc.name: OtterSec Is Cat
misc.desc:
sahuang

I trained a Convolutional Neural Network that can recognize ten different classes of images. The other day, NotDeGhost approached me and said: "Don't you know OtterSec is a Cat? Your model is broken!"

Unfortunately, my model seems to classify the OtterSec logo as a truck. Can you fix it?

misc.name: Sheep loves Maths
misc.desc:
sahuang
Sheep is fascinated about Maths and I found one of his diaries in an encrypted zip file. Can you spot his secret?

Note: The distributed zip file is intended to be password protected.

misc.name: Web3 ZKPLite
misc.desc:
sahuang

ZKPlus was the only challenge in MetaTrust CTF without any solves. Even minaminao suspected it's unsolvable. I am happy to announce that ZKPLite is 100% solvable!

misc.name: not a last minute pyjail
misc.desc:
Quasar

This jail was totally not made last minute (based on gctf treebox)

pwn.name: Cosmic Ray v2
pwn.desc:
Rench

WOOOOO IT’S BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER!!! This time I figured I should stop letting y'all write reviews. Too many people hurt my feelings :((((

pwn.name: File Service From Hell
pwn.desc:
ZeroDayTea

My company recently implemented this new file service but it's just hell to use

pwn.name: LLM Wrapper
pwn.desc:
ZeroDayTea

Wow I found this cool LLM wrapper for my new API! It's still in development but they're all the hype now so I'm sure that's fine.

pwn.name: RPS
pwn.desc:
Rench

Just a classic game of Rambunctious Parchment Snippers.

pwn.name: Tiny Pwn
pwn.desc:
Rench

Recently the GOAT unvariant taught me how to ELF golf. I was so proud of what I made I wanted to show the whole world. But go easy on him... he's just a child.

rev.name: ANNS
rev.desc:
sahuang

In the era of big data, approximate nearest neighbour search has become increasingly essential. Among all libraries, Facebook's Faiss is the pioneer and one of the most popular.

rev.name: LVMProtect
rev.desc:
3dsboy08

vsCTF technologies has just made the worlds™ best™ Lua™ obfuscator™ - can you break it?

rev.name: exceptional
rev.desc:
3dsboy08

Ransomware has struck! Can you decrypt the uber-important flag.png? Luckily for us, they seemingly forgot to delete the program they used to encrypt our files. Maybe that can help?

Note: AVX2 support on your CPU is required for this challenge. Program included only encrypts the file you specify in arguments, you don't need to worry about it encrypting your disk.

rev.name: x0rr3al
rev.desc:
neil

Are you being x0rr3al with me right now?!

web.name: Flarenotes
web.desc:
jayden

My (obligatory) notes application keeps getting pwned but I can't find any vulnerabilities! It has to be something else.

web.name: Optimized Admin Bot
web.desc:
jayden

Launching a whole instance of Chromium for basic client-side challenges is so archaic and uselessly resource-intensive. Check out my optimized admin bot!
